short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Syncs with Cubi to provide additional synced input fields and better defaults

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Syncs with Cubi to provide hands free experience by taking away repetitive clicks and allowing the user to focus on the task itself.
Alerts user when values go outside of the acceptable range
